Rainy_Day_0: Try not to get too wet today darling!
Rainy_Day_1: Will you spend the day in the mines?
Rainy_Day_2: Perhaps this will lift your spirits on this rainy day. It's my grandmother's favorite!$6[454]
Rainy_Day_3: Rain. Important for crops, but less helpful for sky watching.
patio_BrinaFS: Have you ever spent a day in contemplation of Galileo darling?
Rainy_Night_0: Rain, rain, go away... I need to see the sky!
Rainy_Night_1: I can't see the stars tonight. How sad!$2
Rainy_Night_2: I do not especially love a rainy night.$2
Rainy_Night_3: Ah, well, I guess I won't be outside all night tonight!
Indoor_Day_3: Hi darling! What are you up to?
Indoor_Night_1: Ah, there you are, my darling!
Indoor_Night_2: What a long day it has been!
Indoor_Night_3: I am so tired tonight, I don't know if I will be able to watch the stars!$4
Outdoor_0: I like to look at the sky.
Outdoor_1: I feel free to gaze on the stars. I wish I could see them during the day.
Outdoor_2: ...pray that there's intelligent life somewhere out in space... What? Nothing.
Outdoor_3: What crops are growing now? Can I pick something and ferment it?
Outdoor_4: Outdoors the sky is so large.
OneKid_0: How does it feel to be a parent, darling?
OneKid_1: Honey, %kid1 had a bad dream last night, so expect more randomness than usual today, okay?
OneKid_3: Hello, @, %kid1 has a timeout today. No, they know why!
TwoKids_1: Whew! Hi honey, $kid1 got into the peanut butter today, and %kid2 followed, but I think I have saved most of the furniture.
TwoKids_2: Darling, be sure to talk to %kid1 and %kid2 today, they miss you.
TwoKids_3: One child was a lot of work, but two are even more!
Good_2: I am so thankful we decided to get married and move to your farm!
Good_3: What do you think, should we watch the stars tonight?
Good_5: Have a good day on the farm!
Bad_1: I am unhappy. I think I have been clear about that.
Bad_2: I don't know anymore, did we make a bad decision?
Bad_3: I miss the days when we were getting along.
Bad_4: Maybe if we spent more time together things would be less awful.
Bad_5: I wonder if I should move back to my apartment.
Bad_6: This isn't what I had hoped it would be.
funLeave_BrinaFS: I'm off to see my grandmother, honey! Have a good day.
funReturn_BrinaFS: What a lovely day I had! How was yours?
spring_12: Should we go to the Egg Festival in Pelican Town tomorrow?
spring_23: What do you think about going to the Flower Dance tomorrow?
summer_10: Should we go to the Luau on the beach tomorrow?
summer_27: Tomorrow night is the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies. Shall we go?
fall_15: What do you have planned for the Stardew Valley Fair tomorrow?
fall_26: Spirit's Eve is tomorrow. How quickly the year is passing!
winter_7: What do you think about going to the Festival of Ice tomorrow?
winter_14: Oh, the night market starts tomorrow!
winter_24: Shall we go to Pelican Town for the Feast of the Winter Star tomorrow?
spring_BrinaFS: So many things, so little time to ferment them.
fall_BrinaFS: The sky seems more clear in the fall.
winter_BrinaFS: Time to ferment whatever we haven't sold.
spouseRoom_BrinaFS: Hmmm. I wonder what other things I can ferment?$6
